TITLE: Quest name
OBJECTIF_GIVE_LUCK: You must give [Number] luck points to [TARGET_TYPE] [TARGET_NAME]
OBJECTIF_HUNT_OBJET_TERRAIN: You must hunt [Number] [Item] on the terrain [Terrain]
OBJECTIF_HUNT_EMERALD: You must find [Number] emeralds during a hunt
OBJECTIF_HUNT_EMERALD_TERRAIN: You must find [Number] emeralds during a hunt on [Terrain]
OBJECTIF_HUNT_LUCK: You must find [Number] luck points during a hunt
OBJECTIF_HUNT_LUCK_TERRAIN: You must find [Number] luck points during a hunt on [Terrain]
OBJECTIF_HUNT_LOSE_EMERALD: You must lose [Number] emeralds during a hunt
OBJECTIF_HUNT_LOSE_EMERALD_TERRAIN: You must lose [Number] emeralds during a hunt on [Terrain]
OBJECTIF_HUNT_LOSE_LUCK: You must lose [Number] luck points during a hunt
OBJECTIF_HUNT_LOSE_LUCK_TERRAIN: You must lose [Number] luck points during a hunt on [Terrain]
OBJECTIF_SELL_ITEM_LUCK: You must sell for [Number] luck points
OBJECTIF_BUY_ITEM_LUCK: You must buy for [Number] luck points
OBJECTIF_CASINO_EMERALD: You must win [Number] emerald at the casino
OBJECTIF_CASINO_EMERALD_MACHINE: You must win [Number] emerald at the casino with the machine [Machine]
OBJECTIF_CASINO_LUCK: You must win [Number] luck points at the casino
OBJECTIF_CASINO_LUCK_MACHINE: You must win [Number] luck points at the casino with the machine [Machine]
OBJECTIF_CASINO_LOSE_EMERALD: You must lose [Number] emeralds at the casino
OBJECTIF_CASINO_LOSE_EMERALD_MACHINE: You must lose [Number] emeralds at the casino with the machine [Machine]
OBJECTIF_CASINO_LOSE_LUCK: You must lose [Number] luck points at the casino
OBJECTIF_CASINO_LOSE_LUCK_MACHINE: You must lose [Number] luck points at the casino with the machine [Machine]
OBJECTIF_CASINO_PLAY: You must play [Number] at the casino
OBJECTIF_CASINO_PLAY_MACHINE: You must play [Number] at the casino with the machine [Machine]
